name: Super Eraser
description:
Help the eraser to eliminate all the complications in her life in (3 Challenging Levels).

This is a video example to describe the game mechanism.

Try to clear as many scribbles as possible.
Note that there is an indicator bar in the right corner

The 3 Levels in the game are a bit hard.

I apologize for not adding simple levels or training stage due to lack of time.

Waiting your comments and I appreciate your suggestions.
